description: Main application component implementing routing, modal dialogs, and state management for network devices, including components for device table, details, form, toasts, and hooks.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component managing routing, modals, and device-related views.

methods.name: goHome
methods.description: Navigates the router to the root path.

methods.name: openAdd
methods.description: Opens the form modal for adding a new device.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Opens the form modal for editing an existing device.

methods.name: onFormSuccess
methods.description: Handles successful form submission, closing the modal and possibly triggering data refetch.
